call_title: Ergo PoW Dev Update Feb 16th 2025 |  Wallets, Stable Coin, SubBlocks, Bounties, Nodes, and more!

decisions.decision: SigmaUSD Oracle group pushed a vote to the vote configuration to the process and it passed
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.quote: Thursday, the SigmaUSD Oracle group got together. And we pushed a vote to the vote configuration to the process. And it passed, essentially.

decisions.decision: Switched deployment and hosting of NodeView XYZ from GitHub pages to Cloudflare because of HTTPS issues
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.quote: Switch deployment and hosting of NodeView XYZ for GitHub pages to Cloudflare because of HTTPS issues.

commitments.commitment: Rosen Bridge planning to release Binance in the coming days
commitments.quote: We've got the Rosen Bridge planning to release Binance in the coming days. We should see that anytime.

commitments.commitment: Planning to make pop-ups to see parameters or swaps in cross-chain transfers
commitments.quote: Planning to make pop-ups to see parameters or swaps in cross-chain transfers.

open_questions.question: Trying to figure out updated mainnet deployment plan

key_facts.fact: Client 5.0.25 released. Recommended update nodes with extra indices.
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Sigma SDK 5.0.15 released with Execute from VAR
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Release 6.0.0 RC2 supporting 6.0 activation in public testnet
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: For SigmaUSD, reward token is going to be called DORT - dollar oracle reward token
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Keystone Wallet Integration, 3,000 ERG reward, Fleet SDK tutorials, 775 SigmaUSD bounties available
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: kushti released Ergo Protocol Reference Client 5.1.2. They're identical to the 5.0.25 changes, but on RocksDB.
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Oracle operators made the update. Update transaction was completed. Ceremony took about 20 minutes.
key_facts.speaker: qx()
